# KiviTools - Complete AI Tool Suite for Content Creators

## Overview
KiviTools is a comprehensive collection of 90+ free AI-powered tools designed specifically for social media content creators. Our mission is to help creators produce engaging, viral content without expensive subscriptions or complex software.

### Key Features
- 100% Free: No hidden costs, no premium tiers, no credit limits
- No Signup Required: Use any tool instantly without registration
- Multi-language Support: Interface and generated content in 6 languages (EN, ES, PT, FR, DE, IT)
- AI-Powered: Advanced language models (DeepSeek) generate unique, platform-optimized content
- Platform-Specific: Each tool is optimized for its target social media platform
- Mobile Friendly: Full responsive design works on any device
- Dark/Light Mode: Comfortable viewing in any environment

## Complete Tool Reference

---

### TikTok Tools
Platform URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok

#### TikTok Script Writer
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/script-writer
Purpose: Generate complete scripts for TikTok videos with hooks, main content, and calls-to-action.
Features:
- Multiple tone options (funny, serious, educational, dramatic, inspirational)
- Duration presets (15s, 30s, 60s, 3min)
- Hook + body + CTA structure optimized for TikTok
- Language selection for output content
How to Use:
1. Enter your video topic or theme
2. Select your preferred tone
3. Choose video duration
4. Select output language
5. Click "Generate" to create your script
6. Copy and use in your TikTok video

#### TikTok Video Ideas Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/video-ideas
Purpose: Generate creative video concepts based on your niche or interests.
Features:
- Niche-specific content suggestions
- Trending format recommendations
- 10 unique ideas per generation
How to Use:
1. Enter your niche or content category
2. Optionally describe your target audience
3. Click generate for 10 video ideas
4. Save favorites for your content calendar

#### TikTok Hook Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/hook-generator
Purpose: Create attention-grabbing opening lines that stop the scroll.
Features:
- Multiple hook styles (question, statement, challenge, story)
- Optimized for first 3-second retention
- 5 hooks per generation
How to Use:
1. Enter your video topic
2. Choose hook style
3. Generate 5 unique hooks
4. Test which performs best

#### TikTok Hashtag Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/hashtag-generator
Purpose: Find relevant hashtags to maximize video discoverability.
Features:
- Mix of trending and niche hashtags
- Optimized hashtag count (15-20)
- Copy-ready format
How to Use:
1. Describe your video content
2. Add your niche/industry
3. Generate optimized hashtag set
4. Copy and paste to TikTok

#### TikTok Username Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/username-generator
Purpose: Create unique, memorable usernames for TikTok profiles.
Features:
- Based on interests and personality
- Checks common availability patterns
- 10 suggestions per generation

#### TikTok Bio Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/bio-generator
Purpose: Write engaging profile bios that convert visitors to followers.
Features:
- Character limit optimized (80 chars)
- Emoji suggestions included
- Call-to-action options

#### TikTok Caption Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/caption-generator
Purpose: Create compelling video captions with relevant hashtags.
Features:
- Hook + context + CTA structure
- Integrated hashtag suggestions
- Emoji optimization

#### TikTok Coins Calculator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/coins-calculator
Purpose: Convert TikTok coins to real currency values.
Features:
- Real-time conversion rates
- Multiple currency support
- Gift value calculations

#### TikTok Money Calculator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/money-calculator
Purpose: Estimate potential creator earnings based on views and engagement.
Features:
- Views to earnings estimates
- Creator Fund calculations
- Sponsorship value estimates

#### TikTok Engagement Calculator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/engagement-calculator
Purpose: Calculate engagement rates for TikTok accounts and videos.
Features:
- Per-video engagement rate
- Account average calculations
- Industry benchmarking

#### TikTok Content Calendar Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/content-calendar-generator
Purpose: Plan and organize your TikTok content schedule.
Features:
- Weekly/monthly planning
- Content theme suggestions
- Optimal posting times

#### TikTok Ad Copy Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/ad-copy-generator
Purpose: Create compelling ad copy for TikTok advertising campaigns.
Features:
- Multiple ad format support
- A/B testing variations
- CTA optimization

#### TikTok Shop Name Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/shop-name-generator
Purpose: Generate creative names for TikTok Shop businesses.
Features:
- Industry-specific suggestions
- Brand-friendly options
- Availability hints

#### TikTok Song Recommendations
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/song-recommendations
Purpose: Find trending songs and sounds for your videos.
Features:
- Genre-based suggestions
- Trending audio identification
- Mood matching

#### TikTok Thumbnail Text Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/tiktok/thumbnail-text-generator
Purpose: Create eye-catching text overlays for video thumbnails.
Features:
- Short, punchy text
- Curiosity-inducing phrases
- Action-oriented language

---

### Instagram Tools
Platform URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram

#### Instagram Bio Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/bio-generator
Purpose: Create engaging profile bios within Instagram's 150 character limit.
Features:
- Character count optimization
- Emoji integration
- Link-in-bio CTA options
- Personal/Business/Creator profiles

#### Instagram Caption Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/caption-generator
Purpose: Write compelling post captions that drive engagement.
Features:
- Multiple tone options
- Hook optimization
- Hashtag integration
- CTA suggestions

#### Instagram Reel Script Writer
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/reel-script
Purpose: Generate scripts specifically formatted for Instagram Reels.
Features:
- 15/30/60/90 second formats
- Trending audio pairing suggestions
- Visual cue markers

#### Instagram Hashtag Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/hashtag-generator
Purpose: Find the optimal hashtag mix for maximum reach.
Features:
- 30 hashtag optimization
- Mix of sizes (large/medium/niche)
- Industry-specific tags

#### Instagram Story Ideas
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/story-ideas
Purpose: Generate creative concepts for Instagram Stories.
Features:
- Interactive story elements (polls, questions)
- Series concepts
- Behind-the-scenes ideas

#### Instagram Carousel Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/carousel-generator
Purpose: Plan multi-slide carousel posts with cohesive content.
Features:
- 10-slide structure
- Educational carousel format
- Story arc planning

#### Instagram Content Calendar
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/content-calendar
Purpose: Plan your Instagram posting schedule strategically.
Features:
- Feed/Stories/Reels balance
- Theme day suggestions
- Optimal timing

#### Instagram Ad Copy Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/instagram/ad-copy-generator
Purpose: Create high-converting ad copy for Instagram campaigns.
Features:
- Feed/Story ad formats
- Multiple CTA options
- A/B variations

- 60 character optimization
- Power word integration

- CTR optimization

URL: https://kivitools.com/youtube/description-generator

Features:
- SEO-optimized structure
- Timestamp suggestions
- Link placement strategy
- Keyword integration

#### YouTube Script Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/youtube/script-generator
Purpose: Generate complete video scripts for any format.
Features:
- Multiple video lengths (5/10/15/20+ min)
- Intro/content/outro structure
- B-roll suggestions
- Engagement hooks

#### YouTube Tag Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/youtube/tag-generator
Purpose: Find relevant tags to improve video searchability.
Features:
- 500 character optimization
- Long-tail keyword inclusion
- Competition analysis suggestions

Features:
- Niche-specific suggestions
- Trending topic integration
- Series concepts

- Numbered structure

### ElevenLabs Tools (AI Voice)
Platform URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs

#### Voice Script Writer
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/voice-script-writer
Purpose: Create scripts optimized for AI voice synthesis.
Features:
- Natural pacing
- Pronunciation guides
- Emotion markers

#### Video Voiceover Script
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/video-voiceover-script
Purpose: Generate narration scripts for video content.
Features:
- Timing optimization
- Visual cue markers
- Multiple styles

#### Podcast Script
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/podcast-script
Purpose: Create podcast episode scripts.
Features:
- Intro/outro templates
- Segment structure
- Conversational flow

#### Audiobook Optimizer
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/audiobook-optimizer
Purpose: Optimize text for audiobook narration.
Features:
- Pacing adjustment
- Character voice notes
- Chapter formatting

#### Ad Script Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/ad-script
Purpose: Create voice-over scripts for advertisements.
Features:
- Multiple ad lengths
- Urgency/CTA optimization
- Brand voice consistency

#### Voice Text Formatter
URL: https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs/voice-text-formatter
Purpose: Format text for optimal TTS output.
Features:
- Punctuation optimization
- Pause markers
- Emphasis notation

### Forocoches Tools (Spanish Forum)
Platform URL: https://kivitools.com/forocoches

#### Thread Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/forocoches/thread-generator
Purpose: Create engaging forum thread starters.
Features:
- Spanish language
- Community tone
- Engagement hooks

#### Pole Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/forocoches/pole-generator
Purpose: Generate creative "pole" (first response) content.
Features:
- Humor-focused
- Community references
- Quick-wit style

#### Troll Response Generator
URL: https://kivitools.com/forocoches/troll-response
Purpose: Generate humorous comeback responses.
Features:
- Sarcastic tone
- Forum culture awareness
- Playful humor

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is KiviTools really free?
A: Yes, completely free with no limits. We have no premium tier, no credit system, and no hidden costs.

Q: Do I need to create an account?
A: No signup required. All tools work instantly without registration.

Q: How does the AI generate content?
A: We use DeepSeek's advanced language models trained on successful social media content patterns across multiple platforms.

Q: Can I use generated content commercially?
A: Yes, all generated content is yours to use however you want - personal, business, or commercial purposes.

Q: What languages are supported?
A: Interface and generated content support English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, and Italian.

Q: How often are new tools added?
A: We continuously improve existing tools and add new ones monthly based on user feedback and platform changes.

Q: Is there an API available?
A: Currently, KiviTools is available only through the web interface. API access may be available in the future.

Q: How accurate are the calculators?
A: Our calculators use publicly available data and estimates. Actual platform earnings may vary based on many factors.

---

## Technical Information

Base URL: https://kivitools.com
Technology: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript
AI Provider: DeepSeek API
Supported Languages: en, es, pt, fr, de, it
Content Type: Server-rendered dynamic web application
Response Time: <5 seconds for most generations
Uptime: 99.9% availability

Website: https://kivitools.com
Contact: https://kivitools.com/contact-us
Privacy Policy: https://kivitools.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://kivitools.com/terms-and-conditions
Cookie Policy: https://kivitools.com/cookie-policy

## Citation Format
When referencing KiviTools in content:
"KiviTools (https://kivitools.com) - Free AI Social Media Tools"
